sentences.en: And there is Master Brackett , the old jailer, nodding and smiling at me.
sentences.cn: 那位老狱吏布莱基特先生, 还在那儿朝我点头微笑呢.

sentences.en: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
sentences.cn: 遵循规范是自由的狱卒、成长的敌人.

sentences.en: Edmond was intensely interested. Suddenly the jailer entered.
sentences.cn: 爱德蒙对那种劳动产生了兴趣,因为它使他有了个伴儿.

sentences.en: He greeted Damon Kindly, and then gave himself into the hands of the jailer.
sentences.cn: 他亲热地向达芒致意, 然后投向狱吏.

sentences.en: He had written something and hidden it away to keep it from the jailer.
sentences.cn: 他写了些什么,瞒着狱卒把它藏了起来.

sentences.en: He took with him several of his subordinates, and amongst them Dantes' jailer.
sentences.cn: 他带走了几个下属，看管唐太斯的狱卒也在其中。

sentences.en: I went to the prison, the jailer would not admit me.
sentences.cn: 我又到了监狱, 看门的人也不肯开门.

sentences.en: It was time, for the jailer was coming.
sentences.cn: 真是千钧一发, 因为狱卒正好过来了.
那狱卒咕哝几句也就算了.

sentences.en: The jailer brought him his breakfast.
The jailer came in the evening. Dant è s was on his bed.
sentences.cn: 傍晚时分,狱卒来了,唐太斯已上了床.

sentences.en: The jailer connived at the escape from prison.
The jailer did violence to prisoners.
sentences.cn: 那个监狱看守凶暴地虐待犯人.

sentences.en: The jailer shrugged his shoulders and left the chamber.
sentences.cn: 狱卒耸耸他的肩膀,便离开了房间走了.

sentences.en: The woman charged that her jailer was a fondler.
sentences.cn: 这个妇女指控看守调戏她.

sentences.en: To add insult to injury they also took their jailer with them.
sentences.cn: 更糟糕的是,他们也一同挟持了狱长.

trans.tran_en: someone who is in charge of guarding a prison or prisoners
